title: Canaanite Civilization Flourishes
description: Archaeological evidence shows the presence of Canaanite civilization in Palestine, with established cities, trade networks, and agricultural practices.

title: Philistine Settlement
description: The Philistines, one of the Sea Peoples, establish settlements along the coastal regions of Palestine, giving the region one of its historical names.

title: Roman Rule Begins
description: Palestine becomes part of the Roman Empire, leading to significant changes in administration, culture, and urban development.

title: Byzantine Period
description: Palestine becomes part of the Byzantine Empire, with Christianity becoming the dominant religion and significant church construction throughout the region.

title: Islamic Conquest
description: Palestine comes under Islamic rule, beginning a new chapter in the region's history with the establishment of Islamic governance and culture.
